_aChangeLog.text: - Removed the teleportation when falling to the water.
- Players now die when they touch the water.
- Added a terrorist only version of the map.
- Blocks now come out of the middle when the map loads, not when a player spawns.

_sText:
**mg_smash_madness**

This is my first ever released map on CSS, I am a bit late because of the release of CS:GO I know but I prefer CSS in general.

**Map Description**

Made for the new Trinity community, mg_smash_madness is a map about surviving incoming blocks that will obliterate the platforms that holds you're life, what team will survive the longest?

Note: This map is physics intensive.
